# WEEK 9: The Mirror Test

**Write 250 words each day.**  
**Due: Sunday, June 08, 2025 at 11:59 PM**

## Day 1 — Monday, May 26, 2025

The Mirror Test — Write about a time you surprised yourself. What did it reveal about your concept of 'self'?

## Day 2 — Tuesday, May 27, 2025

Moral Machine — Revisit a personal ethical dilemma. How would an AI have handled it?

## Day 3 — Wednesday, May 28, 2025

Empathy Engine — Reflect on a time you *felt with* someone else. What neural or emotional circuits were firing?

## Day 4 — Thursday, May 29, 2025

Code of Conduct — What would your internal ethical algorithm look like?

## Day 5 — Friday, May 30, 2025

Ghosts in the Machine — Write about an invisible influence (family, algorithm, cultural value) shaping your thought.
